description: Deezer Simple API provides a nice set of services to build up web applications allowing the discovery of Deezer's music catalogue.

blocks.name: getAccessToken
blocks.description: Returns access token.

args.name: appId
args.info: The id of your application, generated when you created your application on developer page.

args.name: appSecret
args.info: The app secret is available from the Application setting page and should not be shared with anyone or embedded in any code that you will distribute (you should use the client-side flow for these scenarios).

args.name: code
args.info: The code you received at the previous step.

args.name: output
args.info: The way you want to output the access_token. If not specifed, this will output the access_token as a string to parse (like in the example below)

blocks.name: getAlbumComments
blocks.description: Return a list of album's comments. Represented by an array of Comment objects.

blocks.name: getAlbumFans
blocks.description: Return a list of album's fans. Represented by an array of User objects.

blocks.name: getAlbumTracks
blocks.description: Return a list of album's tracks. Represented by an array of Track objects.

blocks.name: getArtistTop5Tracks
blocks.description: Get the top 5 tracks of an artist.

blocks.name: getArtistAlbums
blocks.description: Return a list of artist's albums. Represented by an array of Album objects.

blocks.name: getArtistComments
blocks.description: Return a list of artist's comments. Represented by an array of Comment objects.

blocks.name: getArtistFans
blocks.description: Return a list of artist's fans. Represented by an array of User objects.

blocks.name: getRelatedArtists
blocks.description: Return a list of related artists. Represented by an array of Artist objects

blocks.name: getTracks
blocks.description: Return a list of tracks. Represented by an array of Track object.

blocks.name: getArtistPlaylists
blocks.description: Return a list of artist's playlists. Represented by an array of Playlist object.

blocks.name: getTopTracks
blocks.description: Returns the Top tracks.

blocks.name: getTopAlbums
blocks.description: Returns the Top albums.

blocks.name: getTopArtists
blocks.description: Returns the Top artists.

blocks.name: getTopPlaylists
blocks.description: Returns the Top playlists.

blocks.name: getEditorsChoiceAlbums
blocks.description: Return a list of albums selected every week by the Deezer Team.

blocks.name: getEditorsChoice
blocks.description: This method returns four lists : Top track, Top album, Top artist and Top playlist.

blocks.name: getCountryNewReleases
blocks.description: This method returns the new releases per genre for the current country.

blocks.name: getArtistsForGenre
blocks.description: Returns all artists for a genre.

blocks.name: getRadiosForGenre
blocks.description: Returns all radios for a genre

blocks.name: getUserOptions
blocks.description: Get the user's options.

blocks.name: getPlaylistComments
blocks.description: Return a list of playlist's comments. Represented by an array of Comment objects

blocks.name: getPlaylistFans
blocks.description: Return a list of playlist's fans. Represented by an array of User objects.

blocks.name: getPlaylistTracks
blocks.description: Return a list of playlist's tracks. Represented by an array of Track object.

blocks.name: getRadioByGenre
blocks.description: Returns a list of radio splitted by genre.

blocks.name: getTop5Radios
blocks.description: Return the top radios (5 radios)

blocks.name: getRadioFirst40Tracks
blocks.description: Get first 40 tracks in the radio

blocks.name: getPersonalRadioByGenre
blocks.description: Returns a list of personal radio splitted by genre (as MIX in website)

blocks.name: searchAlbums
blocks.description: Search albums.

blocks.name: searchArtists
blocks.description: Search artists.

blocks.name: getUserSearchHistory
blocks.description: Get user search history.

blocks.name: searchPlaylists
blocks.description: Search playlists.

blocks.name: searchRadio
blocks.description: Search radio.

blocks.name: searchTracks
blocks.description: Search tracks.

blocks.name: searchUsers
blocks.description: Search users.

blocks.name: getUserFavoriteAlbums
blocks.description: Return a list of user's favorite albums. Represented by an array of Album object

blocks.name: getUserFavoriteArtists
blocks.description: Return a list of user's favorite artists. Represented by an array of Artist object

blocks.name: getUserFlowTracks
blocks.description: Returns a list of user's flow tracks, represented by an array of Track object.

blocks.name: getUserFolder
blocks.description: Return a list of user's Folder.

blocks.name: getUserFollowing
blocks.description: Return a list of user's following, represented by an array of User object

blocks.name: getUserFollowers
blocks.description: Return a list of user's followers, represented by an array of User object

blocks.name: getUserRecentlyPlayedTracks
blocks.description: Returns a list of the recently played tracks.

blocks.name: addNotificationsInUserFeed
blocks.description: Use this method in post only, to add notifications in user feed.

blocks.name: getUserPermissions
blocks.description: Return the user's Permissions granted to the application.

blocks.name: getUserPersonnalSongs
blocks.description: Return a list of user's personnal song, represented by an array of Tracks.

blocks.name: getUserPlaylist
blocks.description: Return a list of user's public Playlist, represented by an array of Playlist object. Permission is needed to return private playlists.

blocks.name: getUserRadios
blocks.description: Return a list of user's favorite Radios, represented by an array of Radio object.

blocks.name: getUserFavoriteTracks
blocks.description: Return a list of user's favorite tracks. Represented by an array of Track object.

blocks.name: getAlbumsRecommendations
blocks.description: Return a list of user's recommendations albums.

blocks.name: getArtistsRecommendations
blocks.description: Return a list of user's recommendations artists.

blocks.name: getPlaylistsRecommendations
blocks.description: Return a list of user's recommendations playlists.

blocks.name: getTracksRecommendations
blocks.description: Return a list of user's recommendations tracks.

blocks.name: getRadiosRecommendations
blocks.description: Return a list of user's recommendations radios.

blocks.name: addCommentToAlbum
blocks.description: Add a comment to the album.

blocks.name: addCommentToArtist
blocks.description: Add a comment to the artist.

blocks.name: setBookmarkOnEpisode
blocks.description: Sets a bookmark on the episode.

args.name: offset
args.info: The offset where the bookmark is set, must be between 0 and 100.

blocks.name: renameFolder
blocks.description: Rename the folder.

args.name: title
args.info: The new title of the folder.

blocks.description: Add a playlist to the folder.

blocks.name: addAlbumToFolder
blocks.description: Add an album to the folder.

blocks.name: ratePlaylist
blocks.description: Rate the playlist.

blocks.name: updatePlaylist
blocks.description: Update the playlist.

blocks.name: markPlaylistAsSeen
blocks.description: Mark the playlist as seen.

blocks.name: addCommentToPlaylist
blocks.description: Add a comment to the playlist.

blocks.name: addTrackToPlaylist
blocks.description: Add a track to the playlist.

args.name: songs
args.info: A comma separated list of track ids.

blocks.name: orderTracksInPlaylist
blocks.description: Order tracks in the playlist.

args.name: order
args.info: A comma separated list of track ids.

blocks.name: updatePersonalTrack
blocks.description: Update a personal track.

blocks.name: addAlbumToUserLibrary
blocks.description: Add an album to the user's library.

blocks.name: addArtistToUserFavorites
blocks.description: Add an artist to the user's favorites.

blocks.name: createFolder
blocks.description: Create a folder.

blocks.name: followUser
blocks.description: Follow user.

args.name: title
args.info: The title of the new playlist.

blocks.description: Add a playlist to the user's favorites.

blocks.name: addTrackToUserFavorites
blocks.description: Add a track to the user's favorites.

blocks.name: removeComment
blocks.description: Remove a comment.

blocks.name: removeBookmarkOnEpisode
blocks.description: Removes the bookmark on the episode.

blocks.description: Delete the folder.

blocks.description: Remove a playlist from the folder.

blocks.description: Remove an album from the folder.

blocks.description: Delete the playlist.

blocks.description: Delete the playlist.
